Class ConnectionSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.Connection

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ConnectionSocket
extends Connection
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class extend and implement the class connection and represent the connection beetwen the server and the client that they will use the sockets to comunicate
    Author:
    Cysko7927

      ConnectionSocket(java.net.Socket socket, View view)
